seg.seg: if he offers the aśvamedha, etc., the great sacrifices.

One may carry out great sacrifices such as the aśvamedha, one may establish pañcavarṣikas and great invitations, or one may give prominent (?) gifts [such as] bones, skin, … (—if one confesses, then this) surpasses [it] through its pure merit. (cf 260)

One might honour koṭis (tens of millions) of arhats, and likewise during a long time pratyekabuddhas, one might evoke …—if one confesses, this surpasses it through extensive merit like the moon the stars. (cf 412)
... [wenn] er Beichte ablegt, [so] übertrifft sie [scil. die Beichte] es [das andere Verdienst(?)] durch [ihr] hohes [wtl. breites] Verdienst wie der Mond die Sterne.
... [if] he makes confession, it [i.e. confession] surpasses [the other merit(?)] due to [its] high [lit. broad] merit as the moon [surpasses] the stars.
Möge einer große Stūpas mit Reliquien anlegen, ...
May someone found/build great stūpas with relics, ...
One might bestow relics [unto] great stūpas, …—if one confesses that one has broken the pure prescriptions, this merit surpasses all earlier [merit] like the sun (the clouds?) … (cf 98)

p.note: Only one side is written on.
